sen.e: Seitaishogun (commander-in-chief of the expeditionary force against the barbarians, great, unifying leader) Tsunayoshi TOKUGAWA who heard Chinzan NARABAYASHI's reputation invited him in 1708, however Chinzan declined this on the ground that he was a criminal.
